raw_body: CHRISTALINE PHILIPS (nee TAMBINAYAGAM) – Beloved wife of late F.X.T. Philips (Retired Deputy Commissioner of Prisons,​ Colombo),​ much loved daughter of late J.J.C. Tambinayagam (Retired Municipal Commissioner,​ Batticaloa) and Agnes,​ everloving mother of Christina (Margot),​ Christie and Christine,​ loving sister of Jessa,​ Louis,​ Aloy and late Freda Vanniasinkam,​ adored grandma of Christian,​ Christen,​ Carina and Adriano. Requiem Mass at Sacred Heart Church,​ Quex Road,​ London. 36,​ Birchington Road,​ London NW6 4LJ,​ UK.043914
